summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5707 for the improvement of 38th Avenue Southwest, from West Kenyon Street to West Holden Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75472, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
